Text:
Thank you so much, MsFenmore! You really do make me so happy every morning when I get to see the show! 

I'm so glad that the storylines have moved on a lot from the repetitive Hope/Steffy/Liam triangle. I'm loving Brooke getting back to her old ways... she always spices things up! 

I still think Ridge needs to come back...

thanks msfenmore
i agree bleslieI i am glad that they have gotten rid of the triangle of those three. I wouldn't mind seeing Brooke and Bill together they are great!!
